description: This header file defines the interface for the DobbyContainer management component within the WPEFramework, including class declaration, method signatures for container operations, and event handling related to container lifecycle and state changes.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: Provides an interface to manage and control containers via Dobby, including starting, stopping, querying, and modifying containers, as well as handling container events.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with an event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Terminates the DobbyInterface, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Lists all containers, returning their identifiers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Gets the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with specified parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container based on a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a specific container, optionally forcing termination.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernate a container with optional settings.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation key from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem source into a container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a filesystem target from a container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Event callback invoked when a container starts.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Event callback invoked when a container stops.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Event callback invoked when a container's state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Event callback invoked when integrity verification fails.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
